column4: Acer Aspire 6530 laptop. Anyone know of success with wireless, and card reader? Looks like everything else will work. Just haven't seen any confirmations on the wifi and card reader.
Also I tried the live cd and all that was found was the onboard modem
try using ndiswrapper with windows drivers for the wireless, probably need to use fwcutter as well
you know if that will work with atheros wireless? evidently that's what it has
